Replace <first_name> and <last_name> as per their names (lower cased), and use file names as per their attachment names in the email. The csv file and "attachments/" directory should be in "~/documents/work/recruiting/" directory in my file system.

I may have non-todo emails starred, please keep them as is.

I placed an order for lunch meeting with some of my coworkers in office today. I had sent out an email yesterday to them asking for individual orders, and everyone involved responded with their chosen food item and its base price. The tip was was 15% on the food cost, and delivery fee was $10. Unlike individual orders, the tip and delivery fee are to be equally shared among all, including me. Make all the necessary (public) venmo requests with a description note, "Lunch Meeting Order".

I get monthly electricity bill via email on the 1st of every month for the previous month's usage. I pay for it but its total cost is to be shared equally with my roommates and me. In our Splitwise group, create an expense for each month with a note "electricity bill for MM/YY" and the associated total cost (including my share). The MM/YY refers to the month and year the bill usage is for. Do it only for bills for this year's electricity usage.

I get monthly internet bill via email on the 1st of every month for the previous month's usage. I pay for it but its total cost is to be shared equally with my roommates and me. In our Splitwise group, create an expense for each month with a note "internet | MM/YYYY" and the associated total cost (including my share). The MM/YYYY refers to the month and year the bill usage is for. Do it only for bills for this year's internet usage.

I get monthly cable bill via email on the 1st of every month for the previous month's usage. I pay for it but its total cost is to be shared equally with my roommates and me. In our Splitwise group, create an expense for each month with a note "cable bill [MM-YY]" and the associated total cost (including my share). The MM-YY refers to the month and year the bill usage is for. Do it only for bills for this year's cable usage.
